protein.specific_function: Catalyzes specifically the phosphorylation of ceramide to form ceramide 1-phosphate. Acts efficiently on natural and analog ceramides (C6, C8, C16 ceramides, and C8-dihydroceramide), to a lesser extent on C2-ceramide and C6-dihydroceramide, but not on other lipids, such as various sphingosines. Binds phosphoinositides

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
activation of protein kinase c activity by g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
